about_the_game:
This is the treasure of NEKO DUNGEON [DLC]
This is a very valuable underwear. It will be strange to wear it to fight.
New special level: Spiral Labyrinth
8 new monsters & 1 very precious treasures(Angel Halo)


How to change clothes?
Beat a monster!
After the appreciation mode is unlocked!
Clothes can be changed in appreciative mode


Thank you for your support and love for this little game!
